Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.quota

package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.quota
Storage quota management for Gumdrop services. This package provides a flexible quota management system that supports both user-specific quotas and role-based quotas. The system is shared across all Gumdrop services including FTP and IMAP.
Author:
Chris Burdess
See Also:
  • QuotaManager
  • Quota
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop
    Core framework for the Gumdrop multipurpose Java server.
  • Class
    Description
    Quota
    Represents a user's quota limits and current usage.
    QuotaExceededException
    Exception thrown when an operation would exceed a user's quota.
    QuotaManager
    Manages storage quotas for users.
    QuotaPolicy
    Defines quota limits for a role or as a default policy.
    QuotaSource
    Indicates the source of a quota definition.
    RoleBasedQuotaManager
    A quota manager that supports both user-specific and role-based quotas.
